formElement.label: Script Location:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the startWeblogic script, including filename and extension. i.e: "/path/to/startWeblogic.cmd". (Required)

formElement.label: Admin Server Instance Name:
formElement.documentation: Instance name of the Admin Server to start. i.e: "AdminServer". (Required)

formElement.label: Config Name:
formElement.documentation: Configuration name from which the Admin URL and credentials will be read. (Required)

formElement.label: WLST Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to WLST. i.e: "/path/to/wlst.cmd" or "wlst.sh". (Required)
